meta.homeTitle: Manoga AI - Vibecoding, AI Consulting & Digital Marketing
meta.homeDescription: Transform your business with AI-powered solutions. 15+ years of digital marketing expertise combined with cutting-edge AI consulting, vibecoding, and hands-on workshops.

hero.title: Build The Future With
hero.description: We combine 15+ years of digital marketing expertise with cutting-edge AI to create solutions that actually work. From vibecoding to workshops, we're your partner in the AI revolution.

services.title: AI-Powered Services
services.subtitle: From rapid prototyping with vibecoding to comprehensive AI consulting, we deliver results that matter.
services.vibecoding: Build production-ready applications at 10x speed using AI-assisted development. We transform your ideas into working products in days, not months.
services.aiConsultingDesc: Strategic guidance on implementing AI in your business. We help you identify opportunities, avoid pitfalls, and maximize ROI on AI investments.
services.workshopsDesc: Hands-on training for teams looking to leverage AI. From prompt engineering to building AI workflows, we get your team AI-ready.

marketing.subtitle: Deep digital marketing knowledge combined with AI-powered optimization for maximum impact.
marketing.seo: Data-driven search optimization that gets you found. Technical SEO, content strategy, and AI-powered insights.
marketing.googleAds: Performance-focused PPC campaigns that convert. Smart bidding, audience targeting, and continuous optimization.
marketing.metaAds: Facebook & Instagram campaigns that reach your audience. Creative strategy, audience building, and ROI tracking.
marketing.webDesign: Modern, conversion-focused websites built with AI-assisted development. Fast, responsive, and optimized.
marketing.gtm: Proper tracking implementation for data-driven decisions. GTM setup, conversion tracking, and analytics.
marketing.analyticsDesc: Custom dashboards and reports that make sense. GA4 setup, data visualization, and actionable insights.

portfolio.subtitle: Real products built with vibecoding and AI. See what's possible when experience meets innovation.
portfolio.welcDesc: Comprehensive cryptocurrency news platform built with Nuxt 3, featuring real-time data, multi-language support, and AI-powered content generation.
portfolio.handballDesc: Advanced handball statistics and analytics platform. Real-time match tracking, player performance metrics, and AI-powered predictions.
portfolio.aboutDesc: Every project in our portfolio represents our commitment to excellence and innovation. We don't just build websites and applications – we create digital experiences that solve real problems and deliver measurable results. Our portfolio showcases projects that push boundaries and demonstrate what's possible when AI meets experienced development.
portfolio.welcFullDesc: WeLoveEverythingCrypto is a comprehensive cryptocurrency news and analysis platform serving thousands of readers daily. Built with Nuxt 3 for optimal performance and SEO, the platform features real-time price data integration, multi-language support across 5 languages, and AI-powered content generation for market analysis. The site demonstrates our expertise in building scalable, content-rich applications with complex data integrations.
portfolio.handballFullDesc: The Handball Stats App is an ambitious project bringing advanced analytics to handball coaches and teams. Features include real-time match tracking with live statistics, player performance metrics with historical comparisons, AI-powered tactical analysis and predictions, and beautiful data visualizations. Built with modern Vue 3 and optimized for mobile use during live matches.
portfolio.technologiesDesc: Our projects leverage modern, battle-tested technologies chosen for performance, maintainability, and developer experience. We work with Vue 3, Nuxt 3, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and integrate AI capabilities using the latest models and APIs.

process.discoveryDesc: We understand your vision, goals, and requirements through collaborative discussion.
process.designDesc: AI-assisted rapid prototyping to visualize the solution before building.
process.developDesc: Vibecoding magic happens - building production-ready code at unprecedented speed.
process.deployDesc: Launch with confidence. Continuous support and AI-powered optimization.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
cta.subtitle: Let's discuss how AI and vibecoding can accelerate your next project.

contact.title: Let's Build Something
contact.subtitle: Whether you need AI consulting, a vibecoding project, or want to upskill your team - I'm here to help. Let's talk about your needs.
contact.name: Name
contact.responseTimeDesc: I typically respond within 24 hours on business days. For urgent matters, feel free to call directly.
contact.freeConsultationDesc: Not sure what you need? Book a free 30-minute discovery call to discuss your challenges and explore potential solutions.
contact.workingWithDesc: When you reach out, we'll start with a discovery conversation to understand your needs. From there, I'll provide a clear proposal with timeline and pricing. No surprises, no hidden fees – just honest, transparent collaboration.
contact.preferredContactDesc: Phone for quick questions, email for detailed inquiries, or LinkedIn for professional networking. Choose whatever works best for you.
contact.globalReachDesc: Based in Denmark but working with clients across Europe and beyond. Remote collaboration is our specialty – timezone differences are no obstacle.

footer.description: Transforming businesses through vibecoding, AI consulting, and hands-on workshops. 15+ years of digital marketing expertise meets cutting-edge artificial intelligence.

aiConsulting.strategyDesc: Comprehensive AI roadmap development tailored to your business goals and capabilities.
aiConsulting.auditDesc: Evaluate your current processes and identify high-impact AI opportunities.
aiConsulting.implementationDesc: Hands-on guidance for integrating AI tools and workflows into your organization.
aiConsulting.aboutTitle: Transform Your Business with Strategic AI Consulting
aiConsulting.aboutDesc: Artificial Intelligence is no longer a futuristic concept – it's here, and businesses that embrace it gain a significant competitive advantage. But implementing AI effectively requires more than just adopting the latest tools. It requires strategy, understanding, and practical experience.
aiConsulting.aboutDesc2: With over 15 years of digital marketing experience and hands-on AI development expertise, I help businesses navigate the AI landscape. From identifying where AI can have the biggest impact to implementing solutions that actually work, my consulting services bridge the gap between AI potential and business reality.
aiConsulting.whyTitle: Why Your Business Needs AI Consulting
aiConsulting.whyDesc: Many businesses are excited about AI but unsure where to start. Others have tried AI tools with disappointing results. The difference between success and failure often comes down to strategy and implementation.
aiConsulting.benefit1Desc: Not every process benefits equally from AI. I help you find the areas where AI will have the biggest impact on your bottom line.
aiConsulting.benefit2Desc: The AI space is full of hype and overselling. My practical experience helps you avoid tools and approaches that won't deliver results.
aiConsulting.benefit3Desc: The goal isn't to create dependency – it's to empower your team to leverage AI independently going forward.
aiConsulting.benefit4Desc: Early AI adopters are seeing significant advantages. Don't let competitors leave you behind.
aiConsulting.processStep1Desc: We start by understanding your business, processes, challenges, and goals. This involves interviews with key stakeholders and analysis of your current workflows.
aiConsulting.processStep2Desc: Based on the assessment, I identify specific areas where AI can drive value. Each opportunity is evaluated for feasibility, impact, and required investment.
aiConsulting.processStep3Desc: We create a prioritized roadmap for AI implementation, considering your resources, timeline, and risk tolerance.
aiConsulting.processStep4Desc: I provide hands-on guidance during implementation, helping your team navigate challenges and ensuring successful adoption.
aiConsulting.faq1: How long does an AI consulting engagement typically last?
aiConsulting.faq1Answer: Initial assessments usually take 2-4 weeks. Full strategic engagements can range from 1-3 months depending on scope. Implementation support is ongoing as needed.
aiConsulting.faq2: Do we need technical staff to benefit from AI consulting?
aiConsulting.faq2Answer: No. Part of my job is translating technical AI concepts into business terms. I work with executive teams, marketing departments, operations – anyone who can benefit from AI.
aiConsulting.faq3: What industries do you have experience with?
aiConsulting.faq3Answer: My background spans e-commerce, SaaS, professional services, and more. AI principles apply across industries, though specific applications vary.
aiConsulting.faq4: How do you stay current with AI developments?
aiConsulting.faq4Answer: I'm actively building AI-powered applications and constantly experimenting with new tools and techniques. This hands-on experience means I can separate hype from reality.

googleAds.searchCampaignsDesc: Targeted search ads that capture high-intent users at the moment they're looking for your services.
googleAds.displayRemarketingDesc: Visual ads across the Google Display Network and smart remarketing to re-engage past visitors.
googleAds.performanceMaxDesc: AI-powered campaign optimization across all Google channels for maximum reach and conversions.
googleAds.aboutTitle: Google Ads Management That Drives Real Results
googleAds.aboutDesc: Google Ads remains one of the most powerful advertising platforms available – when managed correctly. With over 15 years of hands-on experience, I've managed millions in ad spend and seen what works (and what doesn't). My approach combines strategic thinking with AI-powered optimization to maximize your return on ad spend.
googleAds.aboutDesc2: Whether you're starting from scratch or looking to improve existing campaigns, I bring the expertise to make your Google Ads investment work harder. No wasted spend, no vanity metrics – just campaigns designed to drive real business results.
googleAds.whyTitle: Why Expert Google Ads Management Matters
googleAds.whyDesc: Google Ads can be incredibly profitable or a money pit – the difference is expertise. Many businesses set up campaigns themselves or work with generalist agencies, leaving significant money on the table.
googleAds.benefit1Desc: Proper negative keyword management, bid optimization, and audience targeting ensure your budget goes to qualified prospects, not irrelevant clicks.
googleAds.benefit2Desc: Higher quality scores mean lower costs per click and better ad positions. I optimize every element that affects quality score.
googleAds.benefit3Desc: Once we find what works, I help you scale campaigns while maintaining or improving efficiency.
googleAds.benefit4Desc: Understanding what your competitors are doing helps us find opportunities they're missing.
googleAds.service1Desc: From account structure to keyword research to ad copy – setting up campaigns the right way from day one.
googleAds.service2Desc: Continuous bid adjustments, A/B testing, negative keyword refinement, and performance improvements.
googleAds.service3Desc: The best ads won't convert with poor landing pages. I provide actionable recommendations to improve conversion rates.
googleAds.service4Desc: Proper tracking is essential for optimization. I ensure all valuable actions are tracked accurately.
googleAds.faq1: What budget do I need for Google Ads?
googleAds.faq1Answer: There's no minimum, but I typically recommend at least 5,000 DKK monthly ad spend to gather enough data for meaningful optimization. Management fees are separate.
googleAds.faq2: How quickly will I see results?
googleAds.faq2Answer: Initial results often appear within the first week, but true optimization takes 2-3 months of data gathering and refinement.
googleAds.faq3: Do you work with all types of Google Ads?
googleAds.faq3Answer: Yes – Search, Display, Shopping, Performance Max, YouTube, and Discovery campaigns. I recommend the right mix based on your goals.
googleAds.faq4Answer: I offer both flat monthly fees and percentage-of-spend models depending on your situation. Let's discuss what works best for your budget.

seo.technicalSeoDesc: Site audits, performance optimization, structured data, and ensuring search engines can properly crawl and index your content.
seo.contentStrategyDesc: AI-powered keyword research and content planning to target the right audiences with the right messages.
seo.analyticsReportingDesc: Track rankings, traffic, and conversions with clear, actionable reports that show real business impact.
seo.aboutTitle: SEO That Drives Sustainable Organic Growth
seo.aboutDesc: Search Engine Optimization remains one of the most cost-effective marketing channels available. Unlike paid advertising, the traffic you earn through SEO continues to deliver value long after the initial investment. With 15+ years of experience, I've helped businesses across industries improve their organic visibility and drive meaningful traffic.
seo.aboutDesc2: My approach to SEO combines technical expertise with content strategy and AI-powered insights. I focus on what actually moves the needle: fixing technical issues that hold you back, creating content that ranks and converts, and building the signals that search engines trust.
seo.whyDesc: DIY SEO often leads to wasted effort on tactics that don't work or, worse, penalties from search engines. Professional SEO delivers a clear strategy, efficient execution, and measurable results.
seo.benefit1Desc: SEO traffic compounds over time. The work we do today continues driving traffic for years to come.
seo.benefit2Desc: People searching for what you offer are high-intent prospects. SEO brings them to your door.
seo.benefit3Desc: Ranking for relevant searches establishes your brand as a trusted authority in your space.
seo.benefit4Desc: Strong organic traffic means less reliance on paid advertising and better overall marketing efficiency.
seo.service1Desc: Comprehensive analysis of your site's technical health, identifying issues affecting crawling, indexing, and rankings.
seo.service2Desc: Optimizing titles, descriptions, headings, content, and internal linking for maximum search visibility.
seo.service3Desc: AI-assisted keyword research and content planning to capture valuable search traffic.
seo.service4Desc: Google Business Profile optimization and local search strategies for businesses serving specific areas.
seo.faq1: How long does SEO take to show results?
seo.faq1Answer: SEO is a long-term investment. Most clients see initial improvements within 3-4 months, with significant results typically appearing after 6-12 months.
seo.faq2Answer: No legitimate SEO professional can guarantee specific rankings. I focus on sustainable growth and measurable improvements in traffic and conversions.
seo.faq3Answer: I focus on earning links through quality content and outreach, not buying or manipulating links which can harm your site.
seo.faq4: How do you measure SEO success?
seo.faq4Answer: Beyond rankings, I track organic traffic, conversions from organic search, and overall visibility improvements. Real business metrics matter most.

metaAds.facebookAdsDesc: Reach billions of users with targeted ads on Facebook. Custom audiences, lookalikes, and conversion optimization.
metaAds.instagramAdsDesc: Visual storytelling through Stories, Reels, and feed ads. Engage audiences with creative that converts.
metaAds.advantagePlusDesc: Leverage Meta's AI for automated campaign optimization and audience expansion.
metaAds.aboutDesc: Meta's advertising platforms offer unparalleled targeting capabilities, reaching billions of users across Facebook and Instagram. But the days of easy wins are over – success requires sophisticated strategy, compelling creative, and constant optimization.
metaAds.aboutDesc2: With 15+ years of paid social experience, I help businesses cut through the noise and reach their ideal customers. Whether you're focused on brand awareness, lead generation, or e-commerce sales, I build campaigns that deliver measurable results.
metaAds.whyDesc: Despite privacy changes, Meta advertising remains incredibly powerful for businesses that know how to use it. The key is understanding the platform's strengths and building strategies that work within the current landscape.
metaAds.benefit1Desc: Reach exactly who you want based on demographics, interests, behaviors, and custom data.
metaAds.benefit2Desc: From awareness to conversion, Meta supports campaigns at every stage of the customer journey.
metaAds.benefit3Desc: Instagram and Facebook are visual platforms. Great creative can stop the scroll and drive engagement.
metaAds.benefit4Desc: Once you find winning combinations, Meta allows you to scale rapidly while maintaining efficiency.
metaAds.service1Desc: Developing the right campaign structure, objectives, and targeting approach for your goals.
metaAds.service2Desc: Creating and testing ad creative that resonates with your audience and drives action.
metaAds.service3Desc: Building and refining custom audiences, lookalikes, and retargeting segments.
metaAds.service4Desc: Continuous testing, optimization, and scaling to maximize campaign performance.
metaAds.faq1: How has iOS 14 affected Meta advertising?
metaAds.faq1Answer: Tracking has become more challenging, but effective strategies exist. I use server-side tracking, Conversions API, and platform features to maintain performance.
metaAds.faq2: What budget do I need for Meta ads?
metaAds.faq2Answer: I recommend at least 3,000-5,000 DKK monthly to test and optimize effectively. Smaller budgets can work for very focused local campaigns.
metaAds.faq3: Do you create the ad creative?
metaAds.faq3Answer: I can provide creative direction and guidance, work with your existing assets, or recommend creative partners depending on your needs.
metaAds.faq4Answer: We define KPIs based on your goals – whether that's cost per lead, ROAS, brand lift, or other metrics that matter to your business.

webdesign.modernDesignDesc: Clean, contemporary designs that reflect your brand and engage your audience. Mobile-first approach for all devices.
webdesign.aiDevelopmentDesc: Vibecoding methodology for faster development without sacrificing quality. Get your site live sooner.
webdesign.conversionOptimizationDesc: Every design decision backed by UX best practices. Built to convert visitors into customers.
webdesign.aboutTitle: Web Design That Combines Beauty with Performance
webdesign.aboutDesc: Your website is often the first impression potential customers have of your business. It needs to look professional, load fast, work perfectly on all devices, and guide visitors toward taking action. That's a lot to ask of a website, but that's exactly what I deliver.
webdesign.aboutDesc2: Using AI-assisted vibecoding methodology, I build modern, high-performance websites faster than traditional development approaches – without sacrificing quality. The result is beautiful sites that perform technically and convert visitors into customers.
webdesign.whyDesc: In a world of website builders and templates, why invest in custom web design? Because the details matter. A professionally designed site stands out, performs better, and delivers better results.
webdesign.benefit1Desc: Visitors form opinions about your business within seconds. A professional design builds immediate trust and credibility.
webdesign.benefit2Desc: Slow sites lose visitors and rank poorly in search. I build fast, optimized sites that perform.
webdesign.benefit3Desc: More than half of web traffic is mobile. Every site I build works beautifully on phones and tablets.
webdesign.benefit4Desc: Pretty isn't enough. Your site needs to guide visitors toward taking action, whether that's contacting you or making a purchase.
webdesign.service1Desc: Unique designs tailored to your brand and goals, not generic templates.
webdesign.service2Desc: Focused, conversion-optimized pages for campaigns and specific offers.
webdesign.service3Desc: Modernizing existing sites while preserving SEO value and improving performance.
webdesign.service4Desc: Keeping your site secure, updated, and performing at its best.
webdesign.faq1: What platform do you build websites on?
webdesign.faq1Answer: I primarily use Nuxt 3 and Vue.js for custom sites, which delivers excellent performance and SEO. For simpler needs, I can work with WordPress or other platforms.
webdesign.faq2: How long does a website project take?
webdesign.faq2Answer: Simple landing pages can be completed in 1-2 weeks. Full custom websites typically take 4-8 weeks depending on complexity.
webdesign.faq3Answer: I can recommend and set up hosting, typically on Vercel or similar modern platforms that offer excellent performance and security.
webdesign.faq4Answer: I can work with your existing content, help with content strategy, or recommend copywriters. Stock images or custom photography can be incorporated.

vibecoding.rapidPrototypingDesc: Go from idea to working prototype in days, not months. AI-assisted development accelerates the entire process.
vibecoding.fullStackDesc: Complete web applications built with modern frameworks. Frontend, backend, and deployment included.
vibecoding.aiIntegrationDesc: Add AI capabilities to your existing applications or build AI-native products from scratch.
vibecoding.aboutDesc: Vibecoding is AI-assisted development taken to its full potential. It's not about replacing programmers – it's about amplifying them. By leveraging AI coding assistants, I can build production-ready applications at speeds that would have been impossible just a few years ago.
vibecoding.aboutDesc2: The 'vibe' in vibecoding refers to the collaborative flow between human creativity and AI capability. I guide the direction, make architectural decisions, and ensure quality, while AI accelerates the actual code writing. The result? Your application built faster, often at lower cost, without sacrificing quality.
vibecoding.whyDesc: Traditional software development is slow and expensive. Vibecoding changes the economics of building custom applications, making it viable for projects that previously couldn't justify the investment.
vibecoding.benefit1Desc: What used to take months can now be completed in weeks. AI handles boilerplate while I focus on what makes your application unique.
vibecoding.benefit2Desc: Faster development means lower costs. Projects that were previously out of budget become viable.
vibecoding.benefit3Desc: Quick changes and pivots are easy. Your application can evolve as you learn what users actually want.
vibecoding.benefit4Desc: Speed doesn't mean cutting corners. I ensure every project meets professional standards for security, performance, and maintainability.
vibecoding.service1Desc: Get your minimum viable product to market fast. Validate your idea before major investment.
vibecoding.service2Desc: Full-featured applications built to your specifications with modern technology stacks.
vibecoding.service3Desc: Add chatbots, content generation, data analysis, or other AI capabilities to existing applications.
vibecoding.service4Desc: Custom tools to automate repetitive tasks and workflows in your business.
vibecoding.faq1: Is vibecoding just using ChatGPT to write code?
vibecoding.faq1Answer: It's much more than that. Vibecoding requires understanding architecture, code quality, security, and user experience. AI is a powerful tool, but expertise is still essential.
vibecoding.faq2: What kinds of applications can you build?
vibecoding.faq2Answer: Web applications, internal tools, content platforms, dashboards, automation systems, and more. If it runs in a browser or on a server, I can likely build it.
vibecoding.faq3: Do you support the applications after launch?
vibecoding.faq3Answer: Yes. I offer ongoing support and maintenance packages to keep your application running smoothly and evolving with your needs.
vibecoding.faq4Answer: Primarily Vue.js, Nuxt 3, Python, and modern cloud platforms. I choose the right tools for each project rather than forcing everything into one stack.

workshops.promptEngineeringDesc: Master the art of communicating with AI models. Learn techniques for better prompts, chain-of-thought reasoning, and maximizing AI output quality.
workshops.vibecodingBootcampDesc: Hands-on training in AI-assisted development. Build real applications using modern AI tools and frameworks.
workshops.aiForBusinessDesc: Executive-level introduction to AI capabilities, limitations, and practical business applications.
workshops.aboutDesc: AI tools are only as valuable as the people using them. My workshops give your team the knowledge and hands-on experience they need to leverage AI effectively in their daily work.
workshops.aboutDesc2: Whether you're looking to improve productivity, develop new capabilities, or simply understand what AI can and can't do, I offer customized training that meets your team where they are and takes them where they need to go.
workshops.whyDesc: AI is changing how work gets done across every industry. Teams that understand and effectively use AI tools will outperform those that don't. Training is the fastest path to AI competency.
workshops.benefit1Desc: Participants leave with practical skills they can apply the same day to improve their work.
workshops.benefit2Desc: Get your entire team aligned on what AI can do, what it can't, and how to use it responsibly.
workshops.benefit3Desc: Many employees are anxious about AI replacing them. Workshops help them see AI as a tool that enhances their capabilities.
workshops.benefit4Desc: Every workshop is tailored to your industry, use cases, and current skill levels.
workshops.workshop1Desc: Overview of AI capabilities and hands-on introduction to key tools. Perfect for teams new to AI.
workshops.workshop2Desc: Comprehensive training on specific topics with extensive hands-on exercises and real project work.
workshops.workshop3Desc: Extended training over several sessions, allowing time for practice and follow-up between modules.
workshops.workshop4Desc: Condensed strategic overview for leadership teams focused on business implications and opportunities.
workshops.faq1: How many participants can join a workshop?
workshops.faq1Answer: Ideal group size is 5-15 participants for hands-on workshops. Larger groups work for presentation-style sessions.
workshops.faq2Answer: Not for most workshops. I tailor content to your team's existing knowledge and roles.
workshops.faq3Answer: Yes. Remote workshops work well with proper planning and the right collaborative tools.
workshops.faq4Answer: Depending on the workshop: ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, various AI-powered productivity tools, and specialized platforms relevant to your industry.

gtm.gtmSetupDesc: Professional Google Tag Manager implementation with proper container structure, naming conventions, and documentation.
gtm.conversionTrackingDesc: Track what matters - form submissions, purchases, button clicks, and custom events across all platforms.
gtm.ga4IntegrationDesc: Proper Google Analytics 4 setup with enhanced ecommerce, custom events, and cross-domain tracking.
gtm.aboutTitle: Google Tag Manager Setup That Actually Works
gtm.aboutDesc: Google Tag Manager is the backbone of modern website tracking. When implemented correctly, it gives you flexibility, control, and the ability to measure what matters. When implemented poorly, it causes data quality issues that undermine your marketing decisions.
gtm.aboutDesc2: With years of hands-on GTM experience, I set up containers that are organized, documented, and built to last. Whether you need basic conversion tracking or complex cross-domain ecommerce setups, I deliver implementations that marketers can trust.
gtm.whyDesc: Bad tracking data leads to bad decisions. Many businesses are making marketing choices based on incomplete or inaccurate data without realizing it.
gtm.benefit1Desc: Properly implemented tracking means accurate data. No more questioning whether your numbers are right.
gtm.benefit2Desc: GTM lets you add and modify tracking without developer involvement, speeding up your marketing operations.
gtm.benefit3Desc: Connect data across Google Ads, Meta, LinkedIn, and other platforms for unified measurement.
gtm.benefit4Desc: Clean, well-documented implementations are easy to maintain and adapt as your needs evolve.
gtm.service1Desc: Comprehensive review of your existing setup, identifying issues and improvement opportunities.
gtm.service2Desc: Professional GTM setup from scratch with proper structure, naming, and documentation.
gtm.service3Desc: Moving from Universal Analytics to GA4 with proper event mapping and data layer setup.
gtm.service4Desc: Complex implementations including enhanced ecommerce, cross-domain tracking, and custom integrations.
gtm.faq1: Do I need a developer to implement GTM?
gtm.faq1Answer: Basic implementations can be done without developer help. Complex setups may need minimal developer involvement for data layer implementation.
gtm.faq2: How do I know if my current tracking is wrong?
gtm.faq2Answer: Common signs include mismatched numbers between platforms, missing conversions, duplicate events, or difficulty answering basic questions about user behavior.
gtm.faq3: What about privacy regulations like GDPR?
gtm.faq3Answer: I set up tracking with consent mode and cookie banners to ensure compliance with privacy regulations.
gtm.faq4Answer: Yes. Every implementation comes with documentation explaining what's tracking, how it works, and how to make common changes.
